announcement_items.title: QR Code Generator Available
announcement_items.body_html: Create QR codes for events, documents, and more with our new QR Code Generator tool.

announcement_items.title: Faculty Portal Updates
announcement_items.body_html: New features and improved navigation have been added to the faculty portal for better accessibility.

announcement_items.title: IT Service Desk
announcement_items.body_html: For technical support and IT assistance, contact the Help Desk at ext. 2000 or submit a ticket online.
